name: touhou_arthropod_aquatic_large
//: 2 - 3 m long arthropods that feed from smaller whatever, including attacking humans and zombies because that's horrifying

name: touhou_arthropod_aquatic_medium
//: 1 - 2 m long arthropods, these should attack smaller fish, insects, and distinct touhou_arthropod_aquatic_medium

name: touhou_arthropod_aquatic_small
//: <1 m long arthropods, these should attack smaller fish, insects, and distinct touhou_arthropod_aquatic_small

name: touhou_crocodylomorpha_large
//: 2 - 3 m long croco ancestors. Assumed to be either the apex predator or member of the top predators. These should attack whatever is weak or below their size

name: touhou_daedon
//: Hell pigs should attempt to eat anything that crosses their path

name: touhou_dunkleosteus
//: Apex predator, equivalent to touhou_fishancient_huge but I can't think of anything else that would get close in size

name: touhou_fishancient_large
//: Large ancient fish, 2 - 3 m long at most, should feed on smaller fish

name: touhou_fishancient_medium
//: Large ancient fish, 1 - 2 m long at most, should feed on smaller fish

name: touhou_fishancient_small
//: Ancient fish, <1 m long at most, should feed on smaller fish

name: touhou_gorgonopsid_inostrancevia
//: Apex predator. These should hunt whatever is bigger than a dog, including dogs because those bark

name: touhou_gorgonopsid_pristerognathus
//: Large wolf-sized, these can hunt whatever a pack of wolves can

name: touhou_reptile_marine_large
//: 2 - 3 m long aquatic reptiles that feed from fish-sized things, zombies included because why not

name: touhou_sasquatch
//: self explanatory, however it should fear everything at by_mood except for small_animal

name: touhou_yeti
//: more aggressive sasquatchs, should be territorial

name: touhou_thylacine
//: Considered apex predators, however these lived in niche environments such as islands or exotic environments

name: touhou_summon
//: Default faction for touhou summons (vengeful spirits), these should attack everything on sight except for the caster (and allies or neutral parties)

name: touhou_youkai_hostile
//: Default faction for naturally hostile youkai, these should prey on humans and company, on a psychological level

name: touhou_youkai_neutral
//: Default faction for neutral youkai, these should be neutral to humans and company until attacked. Think of passively causing fear or at least a sense of caution in humans
